title: Light and Savory Air Cookies Recipe
directions: Split wienies through middles. Cut cheese slices. Put in wienies. Preheat oven to 400 °F. Put wienies in oven. Cook until golden brown.
ingredients: 100 g margarine, 100 g rice, 1 package onion soup, 240 ml beef broth, 100 g mushrooms

title: Zesty Air Force Chicken Recipe with Zucchini
directions: Melt margarine. Add other ingredients in order given. Bake 45 minutes at 350 °F.
ingredients: 100 g zucchini, 1 piece onions, 100 g green peppers, 1 tsp sugar, 30 ml vinegar, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp turmeric, 100 g celery, powdered alum
